DOC.brief_title: UK Study Assessing Flexible Dose Fesoterodine Adults
DOC.criteria: Male female > 18 year old OAB > 3 month Patients condition would contraindicate fesoterodine use Patients significant hepatic renal disease significant unstable disease . OAB symptom cause neurological condition , know pathology urinary tract , etc .
